entry.title: Welcome
entry.content:
It’s been almost half a decade since my last blog post, so high time for a restart.

Two weeks from now, I’ll be travelling to New York for a 12-week Data Science Bootcamp organized by Metis. During that period, I’ll be living at the Brooklyn Krashpad, a co-housing facility for entrepreneurs, creative people and other types of lifelong learners and doers.

Since visualization, presentation and communication form an integral part of data science, I plan to share my learnings, insights and other adventures via these pages.

So thanks for visiting, and stay tuned!

Welcome was originally published by Frederik Durant at Frederik Durant's .data blog on December 26, 2014.
